document.full_text: one kind of female butterfly mates only once in its life -- and then closes its wings to avoid "harassment" when pursued by persistent and unwanted males, a japanese researcher said.
document.title: not now, dear - female butterfly closes wings to avoid sex
lines_and_colors: one kind of female butterfly mates only once in its life -- and then closes its wings to avoid "harassment" when pursued by persistent and unwanted males, a japanese researcher said.
